title: ISic003476. I.Sicily inscription 003476
body:
Facsimile Images

1[.]ΥΠΡΑ.[..]...ΚΛΕ[.]
2ΔΑΙΗΡΑ[.]ΛΕΙΔΑ
3ΕΠΟΙ.[..]      

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Manganaro, controlled against photograph;
  • 1: Manganaro: Εὐπραξ[ία] Ἡρακλεί
  • 2: Manganaro: δαι Ἡρακλείδα
  • 3: Manganaro ἐποίησε

English translation

Eupraxia made (this) for Herakleidas son of Herakleidas

commentary

The irregularity of the layout may suggest later recutting of the block. Manganaro's reading appears optimistic when compared against the photograph.

bibliography

  • 49.1276 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Manganaro 1999 41 no. 15 fig. 92 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
